      • getAccountDetailTypeIdByName

        public Accountdetailtype getAccountDetailTypeIdByName(String glCode,
                                                      String name)
        This API will return the accountdetailtype for an account code when the accountcode and the respective accountdetailtype name is passed.
        Specified by:
        getAccountDetailTypeIdByName in interface ChartOfAccountsDAO
        Parameters:
        glcode - - This the chartofaccount code (mandatory)
        name - - This is the accountdetailtype name that is associated with the account code (mandatory)
        Returns:
        - Returns the accountdetailtype object if the account code is having the passed accountdetailtype name, else NULL

      • getAccountCodeByPurpose

        public List<CChartOfAccounts> getAccountCodeByPurpose(Integer purposeId)
        to get the list of chartofaccounts based on the purposeId. First query will get the detail codes for the purpose is mapped to major code level. second query will get the detail codes for the purpose is mapped to minor code level. last one will get the detail codes are mapped to the detail code level.
        Specified by:
        getAccountCodeByPurpose in interface ChartOfAccountsDAO
        Parameters:
        purposeId -
        Returns:
        list of COA object(s)
        Throws:
        org.egov.infra.exception.ApplicationException

        Returns:
